name: Quick Clean
description:
This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam, Week 181.

You're getting ready for a New Year's Eve Party, but the place is a mess, and you only have a small amount of time to get everything done! Complete all of your tasks (in no particular order) on time by learning to manage your time wisely.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow Keys or W, A, S, D

Interact: Z, J, or Left Mouse Button(for certain activities)
